title: Admin Dashboard
subtitle: Manage users, system settings, and monitor system health

users.title: User Management
users.description: View and manage all users in the system
users.confirmStatusMessage: Are you sure you want to {{action}} the user {{email}}?
users.confirmRoleMessage: Are you sure you want to change the role of {{email}} to {{role}}?
users.confirmPasswordMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the password for {{email}}? This will generate a new temporary password.
users.confirmApproveMessage: Are you sure you want to approve user {{email}}?
users.confirmRejectMessage: Are you sure you want to reject user {{email}}?
users.temporaryPasswordMessage: Please share this temporary password with the user. They will be required to change it on first login.
users.addUserDescription: Create a new user account. The user will be immediately active.

settings.llmDescription: Configure OpenAI-compatible API endpoint and model settings
settings.anthropicApiKeyHint: Required for Claude models (claude-3.5-sonnet, claude-3-opus, etc.)
settings.anthropicBaseUrlHint: Leave empty for official API, or set a custom proxy URL
settings.claudeKeyWarning: You have selected a Claude model but no Anthropic API Key is configured. Please set the API Key above to use Claude models.
settings.apiKeySetHint: API key is already set. Leave empty to keep current key, or enter a new value to replace it
settings.useModelDefault: Leave empty to use model default
settings.newsDescription: Configure news fetching and processing settings
settings.autoFetchDescription: Automatically fetch and process news articles
settings.finnhubApiKeyHint: For fetching global market news. Get your free key at finnhub.io
settings.allowUserApiKeysDescription: Allow users to configure their own API keys
settings.allowUserApiKeysTooltip: When enabled, users can provide their own OpenAI API keys in settings
settings.allowUserCustomModelsDescription: Allow users to specify custom model names
settings.requireApprovalDescription: New users must be approved by an admin before they can log in
settings.disableApprovalWarning: Disabling this will auto-approve all pending users
settings.useTwoPhaseFilterDescription: Enable two-phase news filtering (initial + deep) for better quality and cost optimization
settings.langgraphDescription: Configure models and parameters for multi-agent stock analysis workflow
settings.useLocalModelsDescription: Use OpenAI-compatible local model services (vLLM, Ollama, LMStudio, etc.)
settings.analysisModelHint: Model for analysis agents, smaller models recommended to reduce costs
settings.synthesisModelHint: Model for synthesis and user interaction, stronger models recommended
settings.clarificationThresholdHint: Clarification may trigger when confidence is below this value (0.0-1.0)
settings.provider.name: Name
settings.provider.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
settings.provider.deleteInUse: This provider is in use. Please unassign it first.
settings.models.title: Model Assignments
settings.models.description: Assign providers and models for different purposes
settings.models.noProviders: Please create a provider in the LLM Providers tab first
settings.models.embeddingAnthropicWarning: Anthropic does not support embeddings. Please select an OpenAI-compatible provider.

monitor.apiPerformanceDescription: API metrics for the last 24 hours

filter.title: News Filter Statistics
filter.description: View two-phase news filtering effectiveness and costs
filter.noDataHint: Statistics will appear here after enabling two-phase filtering
